resources.string: Access to the location service is required for \'Covid-19 traces map`\ feature to work, which shows the count of Covid-19 traces at your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to be enabled. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Covid-19 Map\'.
Location permission is required for this app to work.
A trace is a location visited by a user identified as tested-positive with covid-19 (corona) virus.
A geographical area with high traces count is more likely to be infectious with the virus than an area with low traces count.

We don't show the exact locations on the map to protect users privacy.

We do not record nor require any identification information, such as name, age or gender.
All the data is completely anonymous to protect the privacy of all app users.
